channel.title: A little trick to use on your friends!
channel.description:
download the bottom there...It will make you laugh...open it too!
its a fake virus...you may scan.
Its a small source...its fake you know
[code]Shutdown -s -t 100 -c "TEXT HERE!!!"[/code]
Open up notepad from start and put that in...edit text here and save as "Any name.bat" Bam you gotcha self a fake virus lol!
